pullrequest.title: Fix compiler error due to specified double type instead of btScalar in BulletUniversalJoint.cc on Apple LLVM version 5.1 (clang-503.0.38) (based on LLVM 3.4svn)

content.raw:
Is there an edit button for you at the top of the pull request? When I edit a pull request, I can modify the description and select the target branch. Here's a screenshot:
